properties.areaDesc: Southern Saratoga; Eastern Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Western Rensselaer
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 10:48PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
At 1046 PM EST, an area of moderate snow was located over Clifton
Park, moving east at 25 mph.

This area of moderate snow will be near...
Latham around 1055 PM EST.
Cohoes, Watervliet, Mechanicville, Green Island and Waterford
around 1100 PM EST.
Troy around 1105 PM EST.
Center Brunswick around 1110 PM EST.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 90 between exits 25 and 26.
Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9.
Interstate 87 between exits 5 and 7, and between exits 8A and 9.
Interstate 787 between exits 8 and 9.

Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half of a mile in
this area of moderate snow.

Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be
prepared for snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra
time when traveling.

NWSheadline: AN AREA OF MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN SCHENECTADY... NORTHEASTERN ALBANY...SOUTHEASTERN SARATOGA AND NORTHWESTERN RENSSELAER COUNTIES
